message.body: ￼Craig temper tantrum
￼Don't know if you got this. Craig threw a car at the door
Bastard! No more cars for Craig! That's just a single pane right? We can replace ourselves you think?
Maybe. I called a place and they said it would be $150 because it has to be tempered on a door. I told them none of my glass is tempered on that door but I guess they won't do it.
It is a single pane
Needless to say I'm pissed. We were outside. I put him inside for time out and he threw the car at the door because he was angry
maybe call Swarthmore Hardware. Also perhaps, the guy that did the glass on our car? Growing up we broke a lot of single pane glass in our house. I remember my dad replacing it.
It says online it's easy. We'll figure it out. Craig is in his room screaming and will remain there until he naps
Bad baby!
Holy hell. Hurry up
Coming!
Going on 20 mins sitting here
Trying to get out. Door is locked.
One hour and 20 minutes in this car so far....
coke
I'm here near all your co-workers cars
Did you get this???
Small Italian w/ provolone, lettuce, tomato, onion, hot peppers oil and vinegar. 32oz diet
I got it
Dunno if you'll get this ... But, I'm here.
Walking throug lot
Came out back
